name: Bronze Minotaur
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren’t adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

traits.name: Fire Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the bronze minotaur is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The bronze minotaur is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The bronze minotaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapon
traits.desc: The bronze minotaur’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bronze minotaur makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d12 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breathe Fire (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The bronze minotaur releases a 30-foot cone of flame. Creatures in the area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 52 (15d6) fire damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one.
